desc: Online store for authentic Japanese products from dedicated food manufacturers and the finest artisans from Japan. Find Koji starter (koji kin), natto starter, umeboshi, hon mirin, shoyu, matcha green tea, etc. We choose only natural, safe, organic, high-quality products to support your healthy eating and lifestyle.
